ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] A Lone Bard in Runnyeye?
ygData.msgSnippet: Oppsie, I think the spawn is 21 minutes and if you spread then you fight every 7 mins. Not one gob per 18 - but more like one every 8 - once you got it spread
ygData.messageBody:
Oppsie,

I think the spawn is 21 minutes and if you spread then you fight every 7
mins. Not one gob per 18 - but more like one every 8 - once you got it
spread out.

"The Place" meaning the whole dungeon. Because of mob density, it's hard
for even a single group to fight thru - way too many blues agro and the gobs
try to run - and get help. It seems like you need numbers (2 or 3 groups)
to overpower them safely.

Sylly

----- Original Message -----
From: "Sylly Songsynger" <jgs@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, June 15, 2000 9:09 AM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] A Lone Bard in Runnyeye?


> Except one time, I got in a group that knew what to do: invis and go to
the
> warlord room. Camp there and keep the door shut. Spread the spawn and
fite
> once every 18 minutes or so.

> The place looks like it would be good for 2 or
> 3 mid 20 to lo 30 groups to work if they worked together. But at that
age,
> we were still learning how to be a good single group - let alone
coordinate
> with 2 others.
